issues.issueMessage: Field description: Manufacturer's model name of the equipment that produced the measurements.

Field description: Manufacturer's designation of software version of the equipment that produced
the measurements.

Field description: The serial number of the equipment that produced the measurements.
A pseudonym can also be used to prevent the equipment from being
identifiable, so long as each pseudonym is unique within the dataset.
Field description: Longer description of the task.
Field description: Text of the instructions given to participants before the recording.

Field description: [URI](SPEC_ROOT/common-principles.md#uniform-resource-indicator)
of the corresponding [Cognitive Atlas](https://www.cognitiveatlas.org/)
Task term.

Field description: [URI](SPEC_ROOT/common-principles.md#uniform-resource-indicator)
of the corresponding [CogPO](http://www.cogpo.org/) term.

Field description: The name of the institution in charge of the equipment that produced the
measurements.

Field description: The address of the institution in charge of the equipment that produced the
measurements.

Field description: The department in the institution in charge of the equipment that produced
the measurements.
Field description: Number of ECoG channels.
Field description: Number of SEEG channels.

Field description: `true` or `false` value indicating whether continuous head localization
was performed.

Field description: List of frequencies (in Hz) used by the head localization coils
('HLC' in CTF systems, 'HPI' in Neuromag/Elekta/MEGIN, 'COH' in BTi/4D)
that track the subject's head position in the MEG helmet
(for example, `[293, 307, 314, 321]`).

Field description: Maximum head movement (in mm) detected during the recording,
as measured by the head localization coils (for example, `4.8`).

Field description: Freeform description of the observed subject artifact and its possible cause
(for example, `"Vagus Nerve Stimulator"`, `"non-removable implant"`).
If this field is set to `"n/a"`, it will be interpreted as absence of major
source of artifacts except cardiac and blinks.

Field description: One or more [BIDS URIs](SPEC_ROOT/common-principles.md#bids-uri)
pointing to empty-room file(s) associated with the subject's MEG recording.
Using forward-slash separated paths relative to the dataset root is
[DEPRECATED](SPEC_ROOT/common-principles.md#definitions).

Field description: Object of temporal hardware filters applied, or `"n/a"` if the data is not
available. Each key-value pair in the JSON object is a name of the filter and
an object in which its parameters are defined as key-value pairs.
For example, `{"Highpass RC filter": {"Half amplitude cutoff (Hz)":
0.0159, "Roll-off": "6dB/Octave"}}`.
